author: nicoserranop
content: Hi there! ü´°  I just fixed the CORS error in our frontend app https://kzg-ceremony.party/ but I came accross another problem. We need to set the redirect urls for siwe and github to https://kzg-ceremony.party/signin because right now https://kzg-ceremony-sequencer-dev.fly.dev is redirecting to http://127.0.0.1:3000/auth/callback/

author: bridge-bot
content: <Grzegorz> summoning Marcin who should be able to allow redirect customization & whitelist your frontend url

author: bridge-bot
content:
<Marcin> > <Marcin>  Hey, regarding redirect URI customization ‚Äì you can pass the `redirect_to` param to `auth/request_link`, it will generate links redirecting to any URL, e.g. https://kzg-ceremony-sequencer-dev.fly.dev/auth/request_link?redirect_to=https://kzg-ceremony.party/signin for your redirect. That being said, we still need to whitelist your frontend URL with the auth providers, and I think we must summon @Recmo for that. (re @kzg_ceremony_bot: <nicoserranop> Hi there! ü´°  I just fixed the CORS error in our frontend app https://kzg-ceremony.party/ but I came accross another problem. We need to set the redirect urls for siwe and github to https://kzg-ceremony.party/signin because right now https://kzg-ceremony-sequencer-dev.fly.dev is redirecting to http://127.0.0.1:3000/auth/callback/
